pages.name: Lockpicks
pages.text: $(#008cff)Lockpicks$() are required to gain access to the first dungeon, $(#008cff)The Runestone Dungeon$().

$(#008cff)Lockpicks$() don't have much durability, their main use is to open $(#008cff)Runestone Dungeon Gates$(), which are found at the base of $(#008cff)The Runestone Dungeon$().$(br2)Later on you can find $(#008cff)Runestone Keys$() which will allow you to open gates without lockpicks.
